Drafted in 6th round, 159th overall pick, by St. Louis in 2009...
Injured on 5/12/2009 with a Pulled Hip Muscle, out for 6 days...
Injured on 6/20/2009 with a Bruised Hand, out for 3 days...
Injured on 5/14/2011 with a Broken Wrist, out for full season...
Released by St. Louis on 8/8/2012...
Drafted in 5th round, 117th overall pick, by Texas in 2013...
Injured on 6/4/2013 with a Bruised Cheekbone, out for 3 weeks...
Traded from Texas to Tampa Bay on 7/11/2013 (Going to TB: P R. Korte. Going to TEX: P H. Kuroda, 2B S. Lombardozzi)...
Injured on 7/20/2014 with a Broken Cheekbone, out for 5-6 weeks...
Injured on 4/19/2017 with a Blister On Finger, out for 6 days...
Injured on 7/27/2017 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 5 days...
Injured on 6/23/2019 with a Strained Tricep Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
Traded from Tampa Bay to San Francisco on 2/25/2020 (Going to SF: P R. Korte. Going to TB: P C. Herrero)...
Injured on 7/3/2020 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
Earned first career win on 8/6/2020...
